images.name: Memphis Grizzlies vs. Sacramento Kings: Game Highlights
images.caption: Memphis Grizzlies vs. Sacramento Kings: Game Highlights

articles.description: — Malik Monk scored 31 points, DeMar DeRozan added 29 and the Sacramento Kings beat the Memphis Grizzlies 138-130 on Friday night.
articles.headline: Monk scores 31 points in the Sacramento Kings 138-133 win over the Grizzlies

images.name: LeBron James passes Michael Jordan for most 30-point games
images.caption: LeBron James passes Michael Jordan on the NBA all-time 30-point game leaderboard with a big game vs. the Hawks.

articles.description: With an 18-foot jumper with 5:58 to play, LeBron James scored at least 30 points in the regular season for the 563rd time in his career, breaking the record established by Michael Jordan in 2003.
articles.headline: LeBron James breaks Michael Jordan's record for 30-point games

images.name: LeBron James passes Michael Jordan for most 30-point games
images.caption: LeBron James passes Michael Jordan on the NBA all-time 30-point game leaderboard with a big game vs. the Hawks.

articles.description: — LeBron James scored 30 points to become the NBA's career leader in 30-point games, surpassing Michael Jordan's record during the Los Angeles Lakers' 119-102 victory over the Atlanta Hawks on Friday night.
articles.headline: LeBron James breaks Jordan's record for 30-point games in Lakers' 119-102 win over Hawks

images.name: LeBron James passes Michael Jordan for most 30-point games
images.caption: LeBron James passes Michael Jordan on the NBA all-time 30-point game leaderboard with a big game vs. the Hawks.

articles.description: LeBron James passes Michael Jordan on the NBA all-time 30-point game leaderboard with a big game vs. the Hawks.
articles.headline: LeBron James passes Michael Jordan for most 30-point games

images.name: Things get chippy late between Grizzlies and Kings
images.caption: Words are exchanged between the Grizzlies and Kings after Jaren Jackson Jr. commits a flagrant foul on De'Aaron Fox late in the fourth quarter.

articles.description: Words are exchanged between the Grizzlies and Kings after Jaren Jackson Jr. commits a flagrant foul on De'Aaron Fox late in the fourth quarter.
articles.headline: Things get chippy late between Grizzlies and Kings

articles.description: Victor Wembanyama stole Nikola Jokic's pass with four seconds left, and the Spurs held on to beat the Nuggets 113-110 despite a 41-point, 18-rebound, 9-assist night for the three-time MVP.
articles.headline: Late Wembanyama steal helps Spurs overcome big Jokic night
